hints.content:
$\greenD{90}$ minutes is the same as $\greenD{9\text{ groups of ten}}$.

Emily went to $\redD6$ practices.

Total number of minutes:  

$\begin{align}&\phantom{=}\redD6\times\greenD{9\text{ groups of ten}}\\\\
&=\purpleC{54\text{ groups of ten}}\\\\
&=\purpleC{540}\end{align}$
Emily spent $\purpleC{540}$ minutes at soccer practice last month.

question.content:
Emily went to soccer practice $6$ times last month.  Each practice is $90$ minutes long.

**How long did Emily spend at soccer practice last month?**

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] minutes
